title: How do I back up and restore contacts?
answer: [Touch Backup to back up and restore contacts]()  Backup Touch New backup. Select Contacts and touch Back up, set password and touch OK.  If the default storage location is your phone memory, the backup contacts will be stored in the following path: Manage Files\ local\ internal storage\ HuaweiBackup\ backupFiles1  If the default storage location is SD card, the backup contacts will be stored in the following path: Manage Files\ local\ SD card\ HuaweiBackup\ backupFiles1  Restoration Touch Backup record and input password, Select Contacts and touch Restore.
